reviews.review_msg: I had him for a T/A in a course taught by Steven Weldon. If Josh is teaching 201 now I'd recommend him over Weldon ANY day. Every time I asked him a question he seemed confused, but eventually came up with an answer after some research. Shows he actually cares.
Comments are blunt but VERY constructive. Encouraging and very knowledgable. Approachable and friendly. Definitely recommend!

Josh is definitely a great teacher. He is a very engaging TA and emits that appeal of a teacher, something that we all wish all teachers had. He is not perfect but neither are we. If you do poorly because of his marking - it is justified. He truly cares about his students and does not grade unfairly, and it really comes down effort :)
Super nice and cares about his students.
"I don't know how that answer that, but that would make an excellent masters thesis."
Talks about apartheid more than probably necessary, but a cool guy.
nice, fair marker, made it at least somewhat bearable considering it was a dry pol stats class
